title: Holy crap! The poo jogger scandal goes GLOBAL and makes international headlines
text:
The 'Paddington Pooper' saga has gone global.

In the past 48 hours, news websites around the world have published articles about the bizarre incident outside Roxy Jacenko's office in Sydney.

Publications in New Zealand and the UK have written about the scandal, which the celebrity publicist has described as 'disgusting'.

The 'Paddington Pooper' goes global: Roxy Jacenko's mystery poo jogger has made headlines across the world over the past 48 hours as the hunt to find the woman continues

The likes of The Sun, Metro, LADbible have reported on the female poo jogger, as have Kiwi news organisations like TVNZ and the New Zealand Herald.

The 'Paddington pooper' saga began on Monday night, when Roxy shared shocking CCTV footage of the incident to her Instagram account.

She uploaded videos of an activewear-clad woman running behind a car on Watson Street, pulling down her pants and relieving herself on two separate occasions.

Shocking: The 'Paddington pooper' saga began on Monday night, when Roxy shared shocking CCTV footage of the incident to her Instagram account

Horrifying: She uploaded videos of an activewear-clad woman running behind a car on Watson Street, pulling down her pants and relieving herself on two separate occasions

Furious with the young woman's behaviour, Roxy told Daily Mail Australia she had found faeces on the street for three weeks.

She said: 'It's disgusting, it's a lovely street lined with heritage terraces, kids playing and riding their bikes. Human faeces shouldn't be on any street. Something needs to be done.'

On Tuesday, Roxy confirmed that police were investigating the matter, saying: 'We have been sent info which will be passed to the police.'

Defecating in public is a type of offensive conduct in New South Wales and carries a maximum penalty of three months' imprisonment and/or a $660 fine.

Shocking the world! The likes of The Sun, Metro, LADbible have reported on the female poo jogger, as have Kiwi news organisations like TVNZ and the New Zealand Herald

While the identity of the poo jogger is unknown, some of Roxy's Instagram followers speculated this week that it could be radio personality Jackie 'O' Henderson.

In response to the false rumours, Roxy removed the video in order to delete the defamatory comments.

Jackie herself has denied the speculation, saying that she doesn't go jogging in the mornings because she works the breakfast shift at KIIS FM.
description: Publications in New Zealand and the UK have written about the scandal, which the celebrity publicist has described as  'disgusting'
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
